section.title: Creating a Custom Button
section.para: This procedure shows you how to create a custom button.

step.para: From the Object Types tree, select the type of object you want to create the button for.

note.para:
If
(Add a new Button) is not available, that means you have not created a button group for that object. To continue, create a button group first. See

step.para: In Action, type in a Button Text and Button Hover Text, and select the Button Image you want to use.
In Object Details, select Request from the /System/Process/ dropdown. By default, the message is create. Do not change it.
Type in a Request name for the /System/Process/Request instance.
Type in the Attribute/Value Pairs fields if applicable.
Under Visibility, select which Account Roles you want to have access to this button.
Click Add when you have confirmed that the button accomplishes the task you want.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The button will show in the object type you added the button to.
